name: Dusty Dungeon
description:
This is a remake of one of my first games called Rusty  Robot. 

Original: https://alpaca-dev.itch.io/rusty-robot

You play as a skeleton in a dungeon. Your only objective is to kill all the slimes to go to the next room. The more rooms you clear, the higher your score. Simple, right? But there's a slight problem: The rooms are 100% randomly generated. Because of that, sometimes you die before you even see the layout of the room.
